Reviews.Title: Excellent Ultrabook - Fast and light
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: Very light and fast. 4 GB can expand to 16GB; it has one empty slot for ram upgrade. Battery can be removed like a normal laptop. I can get a backup battery easily. Good deal!

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: This item is exactly what I was looking for. I wish that the item would have been a few dollars cheaper but I'm very satiisfied with it.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Satellite Ultrabook
Reviews.Author: Darren K.
Reviews.Content: Excellent computers. You will love it.  Great , computer for traveling and has Window 98. Remember, the ultrabook is new computer size for Executives.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core™ i3-3227U Processor
HD Webcam and Microphone
Windows 8 Operating System
Mobile Intel HD Graphics
32MB-1664MB dynamically allocated Graphics Memory, 4GB DDR3 1600MHz memory
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba Satellite U945-S4110 14-Inch Ultrabook (i3-3227U, 4GB, 500GB) Ice Blue
